climbs.name: Pin The Tail On The Jackass

content.description: Starts in a right facing flared corner for 25 feet to a small roof. A thin flake right of the corner accepts small cams and opens up for a couple lay back moves below the roof. The flared corner has good hand jams until it widens below the roof. Face climb up a dike past three bolts and a crux. A little run out leads to a rest below a steeper bulge with two more bolts and a final crux.
content.location: Left side of the main wall.

climbs.name: Family Album
climbs.fa: First Recorded Ascent - D. Harris and D. Rogers July 2000

content.description: Obvious Dihedral on the trail near the top. Possibly a FA in July of 2000. Build and anchor and walk off.
content.location: Hiking up the main trail to the top of Jackass Rock from the bridge, before the top is a dihedral on the right.

content.description: Start on a clean face with 3 bolts below an obvious dike. Crux at start. A tricky roof move with good pro and easier fun climbing above.
content.location: Left side of main wall, right of Pin the Tail on the Jackass.
